class.name: ResourcePreloader
class.description: Resource Preloader Node. This node is used to preload sub-resources inside a scene, so when the scene is loaded all the resources are ready to use and be retrieved from here.

method.name: get_resource
method.description: Return the resource given a text-id.

method.name: get_resource_list
method.description: Return the list of resources inside the preloader.

method.name: has_resource
method.description: Return true if the preloader has a given resource.

method.name: remove_resource
method.description: Remove a resource from the preloader by text id.

method.name: rename_resource
method.description: Rename a resource inside the preloader, from a text-id to a new text-id.
